   28: %% Include files
   29: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------

   36: %%======================================================================
   37: %% Tests
   38: %%======================================================================
   39: 
   40: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: %% Test groups
   42: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: all() ->
   44:     [{group, cpd_tests}, xpath_text1, xpath_main,
   45:      xpath_abbreviated_syntax, xpath_functions, xpath_namespaces,
   46:      {group, misc}, {group, eventp_tests},
   47:      {group, ticket_tests}, {group, app_test},
   48:      {group, appup_test}, {group, format_test}].
   49: 
   50: groups() ->
   51:     [{cpd_tests, [],
   52:       [cpd_invalid1, cpd_invalid1_index, cpd_invalid2_index,
   53:        cpd_invalid_index3, cpd_invalid_is_layer,
   54:        cpd_expl_provided_DTD]},
   55:      {misc, [],
   56:       [latin1_alias, syntax_bug1, syntax_bug2, syntax_bug3,
   57:        pe_ref1, copyright, testXSEIF, export_simple1, export,
   58:        export_cdata,
   59:        default_attrs_bug, xml_ns, scan_splits_string_bug,
   60:        allow_entities_test]},
   61:      {eventp_tests, [], [sax_parse_and_export]},
   62:      {ticket_tests, [],
   63:       [ticket_5998, ticket_7211, ticket_7214, ticket_7430,
   64:        ticket_6873, ticket_7496, ticket_8156, ticket_8697,
   65:        ticket_9411, ticket_9457, ticket_9664_schema, ticket_9664_dtd]},
   66:      {app_test, [], [{xmerl_app_test, all}]},
   67:      {appup_test, [], [{xmerl_appup_test, all}]},
   68:      {format_test, [], [formatter_pass,formatter_fail]}].
   69: 
   70: suite() ->
   71:     [{timetrap,{minutes,10}}].
   72: 
   73: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: %% Initializations
   75: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
   79:     ok=erl_tar:extract("cpd.tar.gz",[compressed]),
   80:     ok=erl_tar:extract("misc.tar.gz",[compressed]),
   81:     ok = change_mode(["cpd", "misc"]),
   82:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
   83:     {ok, xpath_lib} = compile:file(xpath_lib, []),
   84:     {ok, xpath_text} = compile:file(xpath_text, []),
   85:     {ok, xpath_abbrev} = compile:file(xpath_abbrev, []),
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: 
   89: -ifndef(dont_rm_test_dirs).
   90: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   91:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
   92:     ok = rm_files(["cpd", "misc"]),
   93:     ok.
   94: 
   95: -else.
   96: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   97:     ok.
   98: -endif.
   99: 
  100: 
  101: %% initialization before each testcase
  102: init_per_testcase(_TestCase,Config) ->
  103:     io:format("Config:~n~p",[Config]),
  104:     {ok, _} = file:read_file_info(filename:join([privdir(Config)])),
  105:     code:add_patha(privdir(Config)),
  106:     Config.
  107: 
  108: 
  109: %% clean up after each testcase
  110: end_per_testcase(_Func,_Config) ->
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: 
  114: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: %% Test cases
  116: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: cpd_invalid1(Config) ->
  118:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  119:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_test.xml"]),[]) of
  120:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  121:             case Reason of
  122:                 {expected_markup,_Path,28,32} -> ok;
  123:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  124:             end
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: cpd_invalid1_index(Config) ->
  128:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  129:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_index.xml"]),[]) of
  130:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  131:             case Reason of
  132:                 {{error,{whitespace_was_expected}},_Path,1,19} -> ok;
  133:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  134:             end
  135:     end.
  136: 
  137: cpd_invalid2_index(Config) ->
  138:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  139:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_index2.xml"]),[]) of
  140:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  141:             case Reason of
  142:                 {{invalid_target_name,_Ver},_Path,2,3} ->ok;
  143:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  144:             end
  145:     end.
  146: 
  147: cpd_invalid_index3(Config) ->
  148:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  149:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_index3.xml"]),[]) of
  150:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  151:             case Reason of
  152:                 {expected_markup,_Path,1,2} -> ok;
  153:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  154:             end
  155:     end.
  156: 
  157: cpd_invalid_is_layer(Config) ->
  158:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  159:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"is_layer2.xml"]),[]) of
  160:         {'EXIT',{fatal,_Reason}} -> ok
  161:     end.
  162: 
  163: cpd_expl_provided_DTD(Config) ->
  164:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  165:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"file_wo_DTD.xml"]),
  166:                                          [{validation,true},{doctype_DTD,"separate_DTD.dtd"}]).
  167: 
  168: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  169: 
  170: xpath_text1(Config) ->
  171:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  172:     ok = xpath_text:one().
  173: 
  174: xpath_main(Config) ->
  175:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  176:     ok = xpath_lib:test().
  177: 
  178: xpath_abbreviated_syntax(Config) ->
  179:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  180:     ok = xpath_abbrev:test().
  181: 
  182: xpath_functions(Config) ->
  183:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  184:     ok = xpath_abbrev:functions().
  185: 
  186: xpath_namespaces(Config) ->
  187:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  188:     ok = xpath_abbrev:namespaces().
  189: 
  190: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  191: 
  192: latin1_alias(Config) ->
  193: %    file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),misc)),
  194:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  195:     {_Elements,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"motorcycles.xml"]),
  196:                                      [{validation,true},
  197:                                       {encoding,'iso-8859-1'}]).
  198: 
  199: syntax_bug1(Config) ->
  200:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  201:     {fatal,{"expected one of: ?>, standalone, encoding",
  202:             {file,'misc/syntax_bug1.xml'},{line,1},{col,21}}
  203:     } = case catch xmerl_scan:file('misc/syntax_bug1.xml') of
  204:             {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  205:                 Reason;
  206:             Err -> Err
  207:         end.
  208: 
  209: syntax_bug2(Config) ->
  210:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  211:     {fatal,{"expected one of: ?>, whitespace_character",
  212:             {file,'misc/syntax_bug2.xml'},{line,1},{col,20}}
  213:     } = case catch xmerl_scan:file('misc/syntax_bug2.xml') of
  214:             {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  215:                 Reason;
  216:             Err -> Err
  217:         end.
  218: 
  219: syntax_bug3(Config) ->
  220:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  221:     {fatal,{{endtag_does_not_match,{was,obj,should_have_been,int}},
  222:             {file,'misc/syntax_bug3.xml'},{line,4},{col,3}}
  223:     } = case catch xmerl_scan:file('misc/syntax_bug3.xml') of
  224:             {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  225:                 Reason;
  226:             Err -> Err
  227:         end.
  228: 
  229: default_attrs_bug(Config) ->
  230:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  231:     Doc = "<!DOCTYPE doc [<!ATTLIST doc b CDATA \"default\">]>\n"
  232:           "<doc a=\"explicit\"/>",
  233:     {#xmlElement{attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = a, value = "explicit"},
  234:                                #xmlAttribute{name = b, value = "default"}]},
  235:      []
  236:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc, [{default_attrs, true}]),
  237:     Doc2 = "<!DOCTYPE doc [<!ATTLIST doc b CDATA \"default\">]>\n"
  238:            "<doc b=\"also explicit\" a=\"explicit\"/>",
  239:     {#xmlElement{attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = b, value = "also explicit"},
  240:                                #xmlAttribute{name = a, value = "explicit"}]},
  241:      []
  242:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc2, [{default_attrs, true}]),
  243:     ok.
  244: 
  245: 
  246: xml_ns(_Config) ->
  247:     Doc = "<?xml version='1.0'?>\n"
  248:         "<doc xml:attr1=\"implicit xml ns\"/>",
  249:     {#xmlElement{namespace=#xmlNamespace{default = [], nodes = []},
  250:                  attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = 'xml:attr1',
  251:                                              expanded_name = {'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace',attr1},
  252:                                              nsinfo = {"xml","attr1"},
  253:                                              namespace = #xmlNamespace{default = [], nodes = []}}]},
  254:      []
  255:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc, [{namespace_conformant, true}]),
  256:     Doc2 = "<?xml version='1.0'?>\n"
  257:         "<doc xmlns:xml=\"http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace\" xml:attr1=\"explicit xml ns\"/>",
  258:     {#xmlElement{namespace=#xmlNamespace{default = [], nodes = [{"xml",'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'}]},
  259:                  attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = 'xmlns:xml',
  260:                                              expanded_name = {"xmlns","xml"},
  261:                                              nsinfo = {"xmlns","xml"},
  262:                                              namespace = #xmlNamespace{default = [],
  263:                                                                        nodes = [{"xml",'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'}]}},
  264:                                #xmlAttribute{name = 'xml:attr1',
  265:                                              expanded_name = {'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace',attr1},
  266:                                              nsinfo = {"xml","attr1"},
  267:                                              namespace = #xmlNamespace{default = [],
  268:                                                                        nodes = [{"xml",'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'}]}}]},
  269:      []
  270:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc2, [{namespace_conformant, true}]),
  271:     ok.
  272: 
  273: scan_splits_string_bug(_Config) ->
  274:     {#xmlElement{ content = [#xmlText{ value = "Jimmy Zöger" }] }, []}
  275:         = xmerl_scan:string("<name>Jimmy Z&#246;ger</name>").
  276: 
  277: pe_ref1(Config) ->
  278:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  279:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"PE_ref1.xml"]),
  280:                                          [{allow_entities, true}, {validation,true}]).
  281: 
  282: copyright(Config) ->
  283:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  284:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"cprght.xml"]),[{validation,true}]).
  285: 
  286: testXSEIF(Config) ->
  287:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  288:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ReplBoard_1_1543-CNA11313Uen.xml"]),
  289:                                          [{allow_entities, true}, {validation,true}]).
  290: 
  291: export_simple1(_Config) ->
  292:     Simple = simple(),
  293:     Res = xmerl:export_simple(Simple,xmerl_xml,[{title, "Doc Title"}]),
  294:     "<?xml version="++_ = lists:flatten(Res),
  295: 
  296:     %% Use of fun in simple content OTP-6679
  297:     Simple2 = simple2(),
  298:     Res2 = xmerl:export_simple(Simple2,xmerl_xml,[{title,"Doc Title"}]),
  299:     true = (Res2 =:= Res),
  300:     ok.
  301: 
  302: export(Config) ->
  303:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  304:     Prolog = ["<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>\n<!DOCTYPE motorcycles SYSTEM \"motorcycles.dtd\">\n"],
  305:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir,"misc","motorcycles.xml"]),
  306:     {E,_} = xmerl_scan:file(TestFile),
  307:     Exported = xmerl:export([E],xmerl_xml,[{prolog,Prolog}]),
  308:     B = list_to_binary(Exported++"\n"),
  309:     {ok, B} = file:read_file(TestFile),
  310:     ok.
  311: 
  312: export_cdata(Config) ->
  313:     InData = <<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>
  314: <doc>
  315:    <a>Test...</a>
  316:    <b><![CDATA[
  317: <c>Test</c>
  318: ]]></b>
  319: </doc>">>,
  320:     Prolog = ["<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n"],
  321:     {E,_} = xmerl_scan:string(binary:bin_to_list(InData)),
  322:     Exported = xmerl:export([E],xmerl_xml,[{prolog,Prolog}]),
  323:     InData = list_to_binary(Exported),
  324:     ok.
  325: 
  326: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  327: 
  328: sax_parse_and_export(Config) ->
  329:     ok = sax_parse_export_xml_big(Config),
  330:     ok = sax_parse_export_xml_small(Config).
  331: 
  332: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  333: 
  334: sax_parse_export_xml_big(Config) ->
  335:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  336:     OutDir = privdir(Config),
  337:     io:format("DataDir: ~p~n,OutDir:~p~n",[DataDir,OutDir]),
  338:     CMOMxml = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","CMOM.xml"]),
  339:     {Ex,[]} = xmerl_eventp:file_sax(CMOMxml, xmerl_xml,[],[{allow_entities, true}]),
  340:     OutFile = filename:join([OutDir,"cmom"]),
  341:     file:delete(OutFile),
  342:     StubFile = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","CelloMOM.stub"]),
  343:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(StubFile),
  344:     {ok,IO} = file:open(OutFile,[write,append]),
  345:     ok = file:write(IO,Bin),
  346:     ok = io:format(IO,"~s~n~n",[lists:flatten(Ex)]),
  347:     ok = file:close(IO),
  348:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  349:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(CMOMxml),
  350:     ok.
  351: 
  352: sax_parse_export_xml_small(Config) ->
  353:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  354:     OutDir = privdir(Config),
  355:     Wurfl_xml = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","wurfl.xml"]),
  356:     {Ex,[]} = xmerl_eventp:file_sax(Wurfl_xml, xmerl_xml,[],[{allow_entities, true}]),
  357:     OutFile = filename:join([OutDir,"wrfl"]),
  358:     file:delete(OutFile),
  359:     StubFile = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","wurfl.stub"]),
  360:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(StubFile),
  361:     {ok,IO} = file:open(OutFile,[write,append]),
  362:     ok = file:write(IO,Bin),
  363:     ok = io:format(IO,"~s~n",[lists:flatten(Ex)]),
  364:     ok = file:close(IO),
  365:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  366:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(Wurfl_xml),
  367:     ok.
  368: 
  369: simple() ->
  370:     [{document,
  371:       [{title, "Doc Title"}, {author, "Ulf Wiger"}],
  372:       [{section,
  373: 	[{heading, "heading1"}],
  374: 	[{'P', ["This is a paragraph of text."]},
  375: 	 {section,
  376: 	  [{heading, "heading2"}],
  377: 	  [{'P', ["This is another paragraph."]},
  378: 	   {table,
  379: 	    [{border, 1}],
  380: 	    [{heading,
  381: 	      [{col, ["head1"]},
  382: 	       {col, ["head2"]}]},
  383: 	     {row,
  384: 	      [{col, ["col11"]},
  385: 	       {col, ["col12"]}]},
  386: 	     {row,
  387: 	      [{col, ["col21"]},
  388: 	       {col, ["col22"]}]}]}]}]}]}].
  389: 
  390: 
  391: simple2() ->
  392:     GenC = fun ?MODULE:generate_section/1,
  393:     GenA = fun ?MODULE:generate_attr_title/1,
  394:     [{document,[{GenA,2}],[{GenC,1}]}].
  395: 
  396: generate_attr_title(0) ->
  397:     done;
  398: generate_attr_title(1) ->
  399:     {{title,"Doc Title"},0};
  400: generate_attr_title(2) ->
  401:     {{author, "Ulf Wiger"},1}.
  402: generate_section(0) ->
  403:     done;
  404: generate_section(N) ->
  405:     GenC = fun ?MODULE:generate_section_content/1,
  406:     GenA = fun ?MODULE:generate_section_attribute/1,
  407:     {{section,[{GenA,1}],[{GenC,2}]},N-1}.
  408: 
  409: generate_section_attribute(0) ->
  410:     done;
  411: generate_section_attribute(N) ->
  412:     {{heading, "heading1"},N-1}.
  413: 
  414: 
  415: generate_subsection_content(0) ->
  416:     done;
  417: generate_subsection_content(1) ->
  418:     {{'P',["This is another paragraph."]},0};
  419: generate_subsection_content(N) ->
  420:     {{table,[{fun ?MODULE:generate_border_attribute/1,1}],
  421:       [{fun ?MODULE:generate_table_content/1,2}]},N-1}.
  422: generate_section_content(0) ->
  423:     done;
  424: generate_section_content(1) ->
  425:     {{'P',["This is a paragraph of text."]},0};
  426: generate_section_content(N) ->
  427:     {{section,[{heading,"heading2"}],
  428:       [{fun ?MODULE:generate_subsection_content/1,2}]},N-1}.
  429: generate_border_attribute(0) ->
  430:     done;
  431: generate_border_attribute(N) ->
  432:     {{border,N},N-1}.
  433: generate_table_content(0) ->
  434:     done;
  435: generate_table_content(1) ->
  436:     {{fun ?MODULE:generate_heading/1,1},0};
  437: generate_table_content(N) ->
  438:     {{fun ?MODULE:generate_row/1, {2,2}},N-1}.
  439: generate_row({0,_}) ->
  440:     done;
  441: generate_row(N) ->
  442:     UpdateS = fun({2,_}) -> {1,2};(_) -> {0,0} end,
  443:     {{row,[{fun ?MODULE:generate_row_col/1, N}]},UpdateS(N)}.
  444: generate_row_col({_,0}) ->
  445:     done;
  446: generate_row_col(N={C,R}) ->
  447:     UpdateS = fun({X,Y}) -> {X,Y-1} end,
  448:     {{col,[lists:concat(["col",C,R])]},UpdateS(N)}.
  449: generate_heading(0) ->
  450:     done;
  451: generate_heading(N) ->
  452:     {{heading,[{fun ?MODULE:generate_heading_col/1,2}]},N-1}.
  453: generate_heading_col(0) ->
  454:     done;
  455: generate_heading_col(N) ->
  456:     {{col,[lists:concat(["head",N])]},N-1}.
  457: 
  458: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  459: %% Ticket Tests
  460: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  461: 
  462: %%
  463: %% ticket_5998
  464: %%
  465: %% A Kleene Closure child in a sequence consumed all following
  466: %% child's. This problem has been fixed.
  467: %%
  468: ticket_5998(Config) ->
  469:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  470:     %% First fix is tested by case syntax_bug2.
  471: 
  472:     ok =
  473:         case catch xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"ticket_5998_2.xml"])) of
  474:             {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason1}} ->
  475:                 case Reason1 of
  476:                     {{endtag_does_not_match,
  477:                       {was,obj,should_have_been,int}},
  478:                      _,_,_} -> ok;
  479:                     _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  480:                 end
  481:         end,
  482: 
  483:     ok =
  484:         case catch xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"ticket_5998_3.xml"])) of
  485:             {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason2}} ->
  486:                 case Reason2 of
  487:                     {"expected one of: ?>, standalone, encoding",
  488:                      _,_,_} -> ok;
  489:                     _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  490:                 end
  491:         end.
  492: 
  493: 
  494: %%
  495: %% ticket_7211
  496: %%
  497: %% A Kleene Closure child in a sequence consumed all following
  498: %% child's. This problem has been fixed.
  499: %%
  500: ticket_7211(Config) ->
  501:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  502:     {E,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"notes2.xml"]),
  503:                              [{fetch_path,[filename:join([DataDir,misc,erlang_docs_dtd])]},
  504:                               {allow_entities, true}, {validation,dtd}]),
  505: 
  506:     ok = case E of
  507:              Rec when is_record(Rec,xmlElement) ->
  508:                  ok;
  509:              _ ->
  510:                  E
  511:          end,
  512: 
  513:     {E2,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"XS.xml"]),
  514:                               [{fetch_path,[filename:join([DataDir,misc,erlang_docs_dtd])]},
  515:                                {validation,dtd}, {allow_entities, true}]),
  516: 
  517:     ok = case E2 of
  518:              Rec2 when is_record(Rec2,xmlElement) ->
  519:                  ok;
  520:              _ ->
  521:                  E2
  522:          end.
  523: 
  524: %%
  525: %% ticket_7214
  526: %%
  527: %% Now validating xhtml1-transitional.dtd.
  528: %% A certain contentspec with a succeeding choice, that didn't match
  529: %% all content, followed by other child elements caused a
  530: %% failure. This is now corrected.
  531: %%
  532: ticket_7214(Config) ->
  533:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  534: 
  535:     {E,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,'block_tags.html']),
  536:                              [{validation,dtd},{allow_entities, true},
  537:                               {fetch_path,[filename:join([DataDir,misc,erlang_docs_dtd])]}]),
  538: 
  539:     ok = case E of
  540:              Rec when is_record(Rec,xmlElement) ->
  541:                  ok;
  542:              _ ->
  543:                  E
  544:          end.
  545: 
  546: %%
  547: %% ticket_7430
  548: %%
  549: %% Problem with contents of numeric character references followed by
  550: %% UTF-8 characters..
  551: %%
  552: ticket_7430(_Config) ->
  553:     %%DataDir = datadir(Config),
  554: 
  555:     {E,[]} = xmerl_scan:string("<a>\303\251&#xD;\303\251</a>",[{encoding,'utf-8'}]),
  556: 
  557:     ok = case E of
  558:              {xmlElement,a,a,[],
  559:               {xmlNamespace,[],[]},
  560:               [],1,[],
  561:               [{xmlText,[{a,1}],1,[],"é\né",text}],
  562:               [],_,undeclared} ->
  563:                  ok;
  564:              _ ->
  565:                  E
  566:          end.
  567: 
  568: ticket_6873(Config) ->
  569:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  570:     ok = xpath_abbrev:ticket_6873(),
  571:     ok = xpath_lib:ticket_6873().
  572: 
  573: ticket_7496(Config) ->
  574:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  575:     ok = xpath_abbrev:ticket_7496().
  576: 
  577: ticket_8156(_Config) ->
  578:     {ftp,{[],[]},"testmachine1",21,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://testmachine1/w.erl"),
  579:     {ftp,{"user",[]},"testmachine1",21,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://user@testmachine1/w.erl"),
  580:     {ftp,{"user","hello"},"testmachine1",21,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://user:hello@testmachine1/w.erl"),
  581:     {ftp,{[],[]},"testmachine1",3000,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://testmachine1:3000/w.erl"),
  582:     {ftp,{"user","hello"},"testmachine1",3000,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://user:hello@testmachine1:3000/w.erl"),
  583:     ok.
  584: 
  585: %% Test that xmerl_scan can decode unicode entities properly
  586: ticket_8697(_Config) ->
  587:     {UTF8Output, []} = xmerl_scan:string("<?xml version=\"1\" ?>\n<text>" ++ [229, 145, 156] ++ "</text>"),
  588:     #xmlElement{content = [#xmlText{value = UTF8Text}]} = UTF8Output,
  589:     [16#545C] = UTF8Text,
  590:     {DecEntityOutput, []} = xmerl_scan:string("<?xml version=\"1\" ?>\n<text>&#21596;</text>"),
  591:     #xmlElement{content = [#xmlText{value = DecEntityText}]} = DecEntityOutput,
  592:     [21596] = DecEntityText,
  593:     {HexEntityOutput, []} = xmerl_scan:string("<?xml version=\"1\" ?>\n<text>&#x545C;</text>"),
  594:     #xmlElement{content = [#xmlText{value = HexEntityText}]} = HexEntityOutput,
  595:     [16#545C] = HexEntityText,
  596:     ok.
  597: 
  598: %% Test that xmerl_scan handles attribute that contains for example &quot
  599: ticket_9411(Config) ->
  600:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  601: 
  602:     {ok, Schema} = xmerl_xsd:process_schema(filename:join([DataDir,"misc/ticket_9411.xsd"])),
  603:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join([DataDir,"misc/ticket_9411.xml"])),
  604:     Xml = erlang:binary_to_list(Bin),
  605:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:string(Xml),
  606:     {E, _} = xmerl_xsd:validate(E, Schema).
  607: 
  608: %% Test that xmerl_scan handles continuation correct when current input runs out at the end of an attribute value
  609: ticket_9457(_Config) ->
  610:     Opts = [{continuation_fun, fun ticket_9457_cont/3, start}, {space, normalize}],
  611:     {_E, _} = xmerl_scan:string([], Opts).
  612: 
  613: ticket_9457_cont(Continue, Exception, GlobalState) ->
  614:     case xmerl_scan:cont_state(GlobalState) of
  615: 	start ->
  616: 	    G1 = xmerl_scan:cont_state(next, GlobalState),
  617: 	    Bytes = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>\r\n<item a=\"b\"",
  618: 	    Continue(Bytes, G1);
  619: 	next ->
  620: 	    G1 = xmerl_scan:cont_state(last, GlobalState),
  621: 	    Bytes = ">blah</item>\r\n",
  622: 	    Continue(Bytes, G1);
  623: 	_ ->
  624: 	    Exception(GlobalState)
  625:     end.
  626: 
  627: 
  628: %% Test that comments are handled correct with
  629: ticket_9664_schema(Config) ->
  630:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_schema.xml"]),[]),
  631:     {ok, S} = xmerl_xsd:process_schema(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"motorcycles.xsd"])),
  632:     {E1, _} = xmerl_xsd:validate(E, S),
  633: 
  634:     {E1,_} = xmerl_xsd:process_validate(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"motorcycles.xsd"]),E,[]),
  635: 
  636:     {E1,_} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_schema.xml"]),
  637:                              [{schemaLocation, [{"mc", "motorcycles.xsd"}]},
  638:                               {validation, schema}]),
  639:     ok.
  640: 
  641: %% Test that comments are handled correct with
  642: ticket_9664_dtd(Config) ->
  643:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_dtd.xml"]),[]),
  644:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_dtd.xml"]),[{validation, true}]),
  645:     ok.
  646: 
  647: 
  648: allow_entities_test(Config) ->
  649:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  650:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "lol_1_test.xml"), %% Depth 9
  651:     %% Disallow entities
  652:     {'EXIT',{fatal, {{error,entities_not_allowed}, _, _, _}}} =
  653:         (catch xmerl_scan:file(File, [{allow_entities, false}])),
  654:     ok.
  655: 
  656: 
  657: %%======================================================================
  658: %% Support Functions
  659: %%======================================================================
  660: 
  661: %% Dir is a directory
  662: rm_f_(Dir) ->
  663:     {ok,CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
  664:     {ok,FileList} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  665:     file:set_cwd(filename:join([CWD,Dir])),
  666:     rm_files(FileList),
  667:     file:set_cwd(CWD),
  668:     ? line ok = file:del_dir(Dir).
  669: 
  670: rm_files([])->
  671:     ok;
  672: rm_files([F|Fs]) ->
  673:     case filelib:is_dir(F) of
  674: 	true ->
  675: 	    rm_f_(F);
  676: 	_ ->
  677: 	    ok = file:delete(F)
  678:     end,
  679:     rm_files(Fs).
  680: 
  681: change_mode(Files) ->
  682:     change_mode3(Files).
  683: change_mode2(Dir)->
  684:     {ok,CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
  685:     {ok,FileList} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  686:     file:set_cwd(filename:join([CWD,Dir])),
  687:     change_mode3(FileList),
  688:     file:set_cwd(CWD).
  689: change_mode3([]) ->
  690:     ok;
  691: change_mode3([F|Fs]) ->
  692:     case filelib:is_dir(F) of
  693:         true ->
  694:             chmod(F),
  695:             change_mode2(F);
  696:         _ ->
  697:             chmod(F)
  698:     end,
  699:     change_mode3(Fs).
  700: 
  701: chmod(F) ->
  702:     case file:read_file_info(F) of
  703: 	{ok,FileInfo} ->
  704: 	    Mode= FileInfo#file_info.mode,
  705: 	    file:write_file_info(F,FileInfo#file_info{mode=8#00777 bor Mode});
  706: 	_ ->
  707: 	    ok
  708:     end.
  709: 
  710: privdir(Config) ->
  711:     proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config).
  712: datadir(Config) ->
  713:     proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config).
  714: 
  715: datadir_join(Config,Files) ->
  716:     filename:join([datadir(Config)|Files]).
  717: 
  718: %%======================================================================
  719: %% New formatter tests input/output
  720: %%======================================================================
  721: 
  722: html() ->
  723:     "<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN\" \"DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd\"><html>"
  724:     "<head><title>Doc Title</title><author>Ulf Wiger</author></head>"
  725:     "<h1>heading1</h1>"
  726:     "<p>This is a paragraph of text.</p>"
  727:     "<h2>heading2</h2>"
  728:     "<p>This is another paragraph.</p>"
  729:     "<table>"
  730:     "<thead><tr><td>head1</td><td>head2</td></tr></thead>"
  731:     "<tr><td>col11</td><td>col122</td></tr>"
  732:     "<tr><td>col21</td><td>col122</td></tr>"
  733:     "</table>"
  734:     "</html>".
  735: 
  736: html_indented() ->
  737:     "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
  738:     "\n<html>"
  739:     "\n  <head>"
  740:     "\n    <title>Doc Title</title>"
  741:     "\n    <author>Ulf Wiger</author>"
  742:     "\n  </head>"
  743:     "\n  <h1>heading1</h1>"
  744:     "\n  <p>This is a paragraph of text.</p>"
  745:     "\n  <h2>heading2</h2>"
  746:     "\n  <p>This is another paragraph.</p>"
  747:     "\n  <table>"
  748:     "\n    <thead>"
  749:     "\n      <tr>"
  750:     "\n        <td>head1</td>"
  751:     "\n        <td>head2</td>"
  752:     "\n      </tr>"
  753:     "\n    </thead>"
  754:     "\n    <tr>"
  755:     "\n      <td>col11</td>"
  756:     "\n      <td>col122</td>"
  757:     "\n    </tr>"
  758:     "\n    <tr>"
  759:     "\n      <td>col21</td>"
  760:     "\n      <td>col122</td>"
  761:     "\n    </tr>"
  762:     "\n  </table>"
  763:     "\n</html>".
  764: 
  765: xml_namespace() ->
  766:     "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
  767:     "<!-- initially, the default namespace is \"books\" -->"
  768:     "<book xmlns='urn:loc.gov:books' xmlns:isbn='urn:ISBN:0-395-36341-6'>"
  769:     "<title>Cheaper by the Dozen</title>"
  770:     "<isbn:number>1568491379</isbn:number>"
  771:     "<notes>"
  772:     "<!-- make HTML the default namespace for some comments -->"
  773:     "<p xmlns='urn:w3-org-ns:HTML'>"
  774:     "This is a <i>funny</i> book!"
  775:     "</p>"
  776:     "</notes>"
  777:     "</book>".
  778: 
  779: xml_namespace_indented() ->
  780:   "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
  781:   "\n<book xmlns=\"urn:loc.gov:books\" xmlns:isbn=\"urn:ISBN:0-395-36341-6\">"
  782:   "\n  <title>Cheaper by the Dozen</title>"
  783:   "\n  <isbn:number>1568491379</isbn:number>"
  784:   "\n  <notes>"
  785:   "\n    <p xmlns=\"urn:w3-org-ns:HTML\">This is a <i>funny</i> book!</p>"
  786:   "\n  </notes>"
  787:   "\n</book>".
  788: 
  789: output_element_to_str(E) ->
  790:     Output = xmerl:export([E], xmerl_xml_indent),
  791:     [Str] = io_lib:format("~s", [lists:flatten(Output)]),
  792:     Str.
  793: 
  794: %%======================================================================
  795: %% New formatter tests
  796: %%======================================================================
  797: formatter_pass(_Config) ->
  798: 
  799:     FetchFun = fun(_DTDSpec, S) -> {ok, not_fetched, S} end,
  800:     %% Generate based on namespace-example
  801:     {Ns, _} = xmerl_scan:string(xml_namespace(), [{fetch_fun, FetchFun}]),
  802:     GNs = output_element_to_str(Ns),
  803:     INs = xml_namespace_indented(),
  804:     INs = GNs,
  805: 
  806:     %% Generate based on html-example
  807:     {Html, _} = xmerl_scan:string(html(), [{fetch_fun, FetchFun}]),
  808:     GHtml = output_element_to_str(Html),
  809:     IHtml = html_indented(),
  810:     GHtml = IHtml,
  811:     ok.
  812: 
  813: formatter_fail(_Config) ->
  814:     ok.
